name: Big Bear Frontier
address: 40472 Big Bear Boulevard, Big Bear Lake, CA 92315, United States of America
description:
One of our top picks in Big Bear Lake.
Located on a private beach on the shores of Big Bear Lake, this resort offers free Wi-Fi and is 0.3 mi from the Alpine Slide at Magic Mountain. Guests can take advantage of the on-site swimming pool and hot tub.
A refrigerator and a dining area are part of every room and villa at Big Bear Frontier. They have cable TV and are equipped with helpful amenities like a coffee maker and a hairdryer. Some rooms have fireplaces.
Guests can fish or swim in the lake. A business center is also part of the pet-friendly resort.
The Big Bear Pirate Shipâ€Ž is 0.4 mi away. Moonridge Animal Park is 11 minutes' drive from the resort. The nearest airport is Ontario Airport, 58 mi away.

Pets: Pets are allowed on request. Charges may apply.
Internet: Free! WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.
Outdoor swimming pool:
Free!
 All pools are free of charge
